Dialogue: Then they'll be crying like babies!

Speaker: snotlout
Dialogue: Funny and beautiful.

Speaker: fishlegs
Dialogue: Good one, babe!

Speaker: tuffnut
Dialogue: Yeah. Like babies. They always cry. Real tiny ones...

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: First there was one rider. And now all of Berk.   And YOU led them to me.

Speaker: eret
Dialogue: Drago!

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: CEASE ALL PREPARATIONS! WE MUST  ATTACK THE DRAGONS RIDER'S NEST AT  ONCE!    WE WILL TAKE DOWN THEIR ALPHA...  AND THEN WE WILL TAKE BERK!

Speaker: eret
Dialogue: You're overreacting!

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: And get rid of him.

Speaker: eret
Dialogue: Drago, please...

Speaker: astrid
Dialogue: STORMFLY!

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Well, bud, we can't wait around for Drago to attack this place. We've gotta find him first. Let's go.

Speaker: stoick
Dialogue: Easy now.

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Are you kidding me? How'd you get in here?

Speaker: stoick
Dialogue: The same way we're getting you out.

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: We?

Speaker: gobber
Dialogue: All clear!

Speaker: stoick
Dialogue: Toothless. Come.

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Dad! There's something you need to know!

Speaker: stoick
Dialogue: Yeah, yeah, tell me on the way.

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: This isn't an on-the-way kind of update, actually...

Speaker: stoick
Dialogue: I've heard ENOUGH, Hiccup.

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: ... more of the earth-shattering development variety.

Speaker: stoick
Dialogue: Yeah, just add it to the pile.

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Dad, unlike most surprises I spring on you, this is one you'll like. I promise! You just have to handle it delicately, so...

Speaker: gobber
Dialogue: Uh, you might want to take this one. Oh, boy.

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Dad, can you put the sword away... please?

Speaker: valka
Dialogue: I know what you're going to say, Stoick. How could I have done this? Stayed away all of these years. And why didn't I come back to you? To our son.

Speaker: gobber
Dialogue: This is why I never married.   This and one other reason.

Speaker: valka
Dialogue: I know that I left you to raise Hiccup alone... but I thought he'd be better off without me. And I was wrong, I see that now, but...

Speaker: stoick
Dialogue: You're as beautiful as the day I lost you.

Speaker: snotlout
Dialogue: Could this day get any worse?

Speaker: tuffnut
Dialogue: Uh, let me see. You'll jump into freezing cold water and then die from drowning.

Speaker: eret
Dialogue: Looks refreshing.

Speaker: astrid
Dialogue: You are a steaming heap of dragon --

Speaker: eret
Dialogue: -- Duck.

Speaker: soldier
Dialogue: Warn the others!

Speaker: ruffnut
Dialogue: Get `em, you son of an Eret!

Speaker: tuffnut
Dialogue: Ugh. Pathetic. You can still jump.

Speaker: eret
Dialogue: So? Are we going to save your dragons and get out of here or not?

Speaker: astrid
Dialogue: Meatlug?

Speaker: eret
Dialogue: Anyone coming?

Speaker: ruffnut
Dialogue: I don't know. You just keep doing what you're doing. Keep crankin'...

Speaker: eret
Dialogue: Thank you for saving my life.   Now let me return the favor.

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Mom, you'd never recognize it! Where we used to make weapons, we now build saddles, wing slings -- we even fix dragon teeth! You wouldn't believe how much everything's changed!

Speaker: stoick
Dialogue: Our son's changed Berk for the better. I think we did well with this one, Val.

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Thanks, Dad.

Speaker: valka
Dialogue: I'm... a little out of practice.

Speaker: stoick
Dialogue: Well, y'know... I didn't marry you for your cooking.

Speaker: gobber
Dialogue: I've still got a few knocking around in here. Ha ha!

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: And once you move back in, with all of your dragons, Drago won't even stand a chance. Everything will be okay!

Speaker: stoick
Dialogue: Slow down, son. It's a lot to take in.

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Oh. Gotcha.

Speaker: gobber
Dialogue: Oh, I love this one!

Speaker: stoick
Dialogue: Remember our song, Val?

Speaker: gobber
Dialogue: Sorry.

Speaker: stoick
Dialogue: If you will promise me your heart...

Speaker: valka
Dialogue: And love me for eternity.

Speaker: stoick
Dialogue: And I would keep you from all harm, if you'd stay here beside me.

Speaker: valka
Dialogue: I have no use for rings of gold. I care not for your poetry. I only want your hand to hold. I only want you near me.

Speaker: gobber
Dialogue: C'mon, Hiccup!

Speaker: gobber
Dialogue: I'm still going...

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Gobber!

Speaker: gobber
Dialogue: I'm done.

Speaker: stoick
Dialogue: Ah... I thought I'd have to die before we'd have that dance again.

Speaker: valka
Dialogue: No need for drastic measures.

Speaker: stoick
Dialogue: For you, my dear... anything.

Speaker: valka
Dialogue: Yes!

Speaker: gobber
Dialogue: Great! I'll do the cooking!

Speaker: stoick
Dialogue: Thank Odin you didn't listen to me, son. We never would have found each other. Suddenly, Toothless and Cloudjumper suddenly perk up, sensing something unheard. Hiccup notices.

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Toothless?

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Oh, no...

Speaker: stoick
Dialogue: Val! It's all right, it's all right. We're a team now.   Now what do you want to do?

Speaker: valka
Dialogue: We have to save the dragons.

Speaker: stoick
Dialogue: Aye. You got it!

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: Whatever comes, keep hitting the mountain! We need to draw the alpha out.

Speaker: tuffnut
Dialogue: Surprise! Yeah!

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: WHAT?!

Speaker: astrid
Dialogue: You really are full of surprises.

Speaker: tuffnut
Dialogue: Dragon Riders coming through!

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: CUT THEM DOWN!

Speaker: ruffnut
Dialogue: Eret, son of Eret!

Speaker: astrid
Dialogue: Up, girl! To the left, Eret! That's it! Look out!

Speaker: archer
Dialogue: Take `em down!

Speaker: gobber
Dialogue: Heads up!

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: Dragon Master.

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Welcome aboard, dragon rider!

Speaker: eret
Dialogue: Thanks. I think.

Speaker: astrid
Dialogue: Where have you been?

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Oh, y'know. Catching up with Mom.

Speaker: eret
Dialogue: Whoa...

Speaker: astrid
Dialogue: That's your mother?!

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Well, now you know where I get my dramatic flair.

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: The alpha! Now we have a fight!

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: There! Come on, Toothless! Show them what you got, bud. Toothless dive-bombs the swatter and DESTROYS it with a plasma bolt, freeing the dragon.

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: I've waited a long time for this!

Speaker: valka
Dialogue: You cannot take our dragons! They are controlled by the alpha!

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: Then it's a good thing I brought a challenger.

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Another one?

Speaker: fishlegs
Dialogue: I WAS WAY OFF! THAT IS A CLASS TEN!  CLASS TEN!

Speaker: valka
Dialogue: No. No.

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: Come on! Take down the alpha!

Speaker: valka
Dialogue: Thank you.

Speaker: stoick
Dialogue: For you, my dear... anything.

Speaker: valka
Dialogue: I'll do my best! Come on, Cloudjumper!

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: You... I watched you burn!

Speaker: stoick
Dialogue: It takes more than a little fire to kill me!

Speaker: gobber
Dialogue: Stoick!

Speaker: valka
Dialogue: No!

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: We've won.

Speaker: stoick
Dialogue: No!

Speaker: gobber
Dialogue: Right behind ya, Stoick!

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: STOP! Stop!

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: This... is the great dragon master? The son of Stoick the Vast? What shame he must feel.

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: All of this loss, and for what? To become unstoppable? To rule the world?

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: Or tear them apart.

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Then why a dragon army?

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: Well, you need dragons to conquer other dragons.

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Or maybe you need dragons to conquer people.   To control those who follow you... and to get rid of those who won't.

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: Clever boy.

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: The world wants peace. And we have the answer, back on Berk. Just let me show you.

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: NO! Let ME show YOU.

Speaker: stoick
Dialogue: What...?

Speaker: gobber
Dialogue: Okay, change of plans.

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: No dragon can resist the alpha's command. So he who controls the alpha, controls them all.

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Toothless? You okay, bud? What's going on?

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: Witness true strength. The strength of will over others. In the face of it, you are nothing.

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Uh, what did he just tell you?

Speaker: stoick
Dialogue: Hiccup!

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: STOP!

Speaker: stoick
Dialogue: SON!

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: DAD! NO!

Speaker: valka
Dialogue: Stoick... She helps Hiccup to turn Stoick's body over. Valka presses her ear to Stoick's heart, confirming his death with a mere glance to Hiccup. He tears up, overwhelmed.

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: No... you...

Speaker: valka
Dialogue: It's not his fault. You know that.

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: GATHER THE MEN AND MEET AT BERK!

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Toothless! Hiccup tries to go after Toothless, but Valka holds him back.

Speaker: valka
Dialogue: No, don't!

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: Move out!

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: I'm sorry, Dad.

Speaker: valka
Dialogue: You came early into this world. You were such a wee thing. So frail, so fragile. I feared you wouldn't make it.

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: I was so afraid of becoming my dad. Mostly because I thought I never could. How do you become someone that great? That brave? That selfless?   A chief protects his own. We're going back.

Speaker: tuffnut
Dialogue: Uh, with what?

Speaker: ruffnut
Dialogue: He took all the dragons.

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Not all of them.

Speaker: ruffnut
Dialogue: Fly straight!

Speaker: fishlegs
Dialogue: I don't want to die!

Speaker: tuffnut
Dialogue: We can't fly these things!

Speaker: fishlegs
Dialogue: Yeah, no kidding!

Speaker: astrid
Dialogue: But won't that Bewilderbeast just take control of these guys, too?

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: They're babies. They don't listen to anyone!

Speaker: tuffnut
Dialogue: Yeah, just like us!

Speaker: gobber
Dialogue: This... is... very dangerous!

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Well, it's a good thing that I never listen.

Speaker: gobber
Dialogue: So what IS your plan?!

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Get Toothless back and kick Drago's-

Speaker: gobber
Dialogue: Heads up!

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: And that thing.

Speaker: hoark
Dialogue: Ah, that's a good boy!

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: Your chief is dead.

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: No...

Speaker: fishlegs
Dialogue: He took all the dragons!

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Distract the alpha. Try to keep his focus off of Toothless.

Speaker: tuffnut
Dialogue: Uh... how?

Speaker: eret
Dialogue: Have you forgotten who you're riding with?

Speaker: snotlout
Dialogue: Amateur.

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: ruffnut
Dialogue: Keep `em coming!

Speaker: snotlout
Dialogue: Black sheep, baby!

Speaker: fishlegs
Dialogue: I'm okay!

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: You certainly are hard to get rid of. I'll say that.

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Toothless? It's me, bud. It's me. I'm right here. Come back to me.

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: He is not yours anymore. He belongs to the alpha!

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: It wasn't your fault, bud. They made you do it.

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: How are you doing that?

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Please. You are my best friend, bud.

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: No!

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Yeah!

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: Do something!

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: We need to get those two apart.

Speaker: astrid
Dialogue: Take them down, babe!

Speaker: valka
Dialogue: Go get `em.

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: Take control of it!

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Shut it out, Toothless!

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: STOP THEM!

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: NOW!

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: Agghh!

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Hold him there Toothless!

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: Or is it?

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Oh, no!

Speaker: valka
Dialogue: No! No...

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: He's challenging the alpha!

Speaker: valka
Dialogue: To protect you. The Bewilderbeast ROARS at this act of insubordination. Toothless fires back, time and again, fully in control.

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: No, no, no, no! Fight back! Fight!  FIGHT!

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Now do you get it? This is what it is to earn a dragon's loyalty.   Let this end now.

Speaker: drago
Dialogue: Never! Come on!

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: The alpha protects them all.

Speaker: astrid
Dialogue: Stormfly!

Speaker: gobber
Dialogue: Oh, give me a cuddle, Grumpy!

Speaker: fishlegs
Dialogue: Who's my little princess?

Speaker: snotlout
Dialogue: Don't you ever leave again, Hookfang!

Speaker: ruffnut
Dialogue: Oh Barf!

Speaker: eret
Dialogue: That was some pretty fine dragon wrangling back there. You'd make a good trapper.

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Y'know, Skullcrusher's gonna need somebody to look after him now.

Speaker: eret
Dialogue: Me?

Speaker: valka
Dialogue: Your father... he'd be every bit as proud as I am.

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Thank you. I'm really glad you're here, Mom.

Speaker: valka
Dialogue: And here I'll stay.

Speaker: astrid
Dialogue: See? I told you it was in here.

Speaker: hiccup
Dialogue: Ha, ha. Still doing that one? That's hilarious.   Come here, you.

Speaker: gobber
Dialogue: Ooh.
